abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: You may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, remove that many damage counters from Ludicolo.
Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's), excluding Ludicolo.
